titleStmt.title: Grampius gratulatius to his high and mightie monarch, King Charles. By William Douglas
titleStmt.author: Morton, William Douglas, Earl of, 1583 or 4-1648.

notesStmt.note: Usually found as part 3 of STC 7486: Eisodia musarum Edinensium in Caroli regis, Musarum Tutani, ingressu in Scotiam.
Also appears as part 3 of STC 7486 on UMI microfilm reel 782.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
